He’s taller than you, broader than you and stronger than you, bouncing off the mound after strikeouts while he pounds his chest and slaps his glove. He’s built to rip off fastballs and slid…

articles.title: Nothing, Not One Thing, Will Ever Distract Owen Power - Defector
articles.description: Owen Power, last year’s first overall draft pick, will make his NHL debut Tuesday night when the Buffalo Sabres take on his hometown Toronto Maple Leafs. In preparation, the Sabres posted a Q&A video for fans to “get to know” him. Having watched it several ti…
